title: Professional Developer Portfolio Website - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Implement Hero section with name, introduction, CTAs, and entrance animations
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the exact title 'Aspiring Software Developer | Computer Science Student'
Short introduction paragraph is present and focuses on problem-solving
Two distinct CTA buttons are visible: 'View Projects' and 'Download Resume'
Entrance animations trigger on page load with fade-in and slide-up effects

file_operations.description: Create Hero component with title 'Aspiring Software Developer | Computer Science Student', introduction paragraph focused on problem-solving and building real-world applications, and two CTA buttons ('View Projects' scrolls to projects section, 'Download Resume' triggers PDF download). Implement fade-in and slide-up animations on mount using CSS transitions or Framer Motion.
Import and render Hero component at the top of the main application layout.

requirements.summary: Implement About Me section with bio and scroll-triggered fade-in animation
acceptanceCriteria: About Me section contains a bio text of 5-6 lines
Bio emphasizes technical curiosity, learning mindset, and career goals
Fade-in animation triggers when section enters viewport

file_operations.description: Create About component with a 5-6 line professional bio emphasizing technical curiosity, learning mindset, and career goals. Implement intersection observer to trigger gentle fade-in animation when section scrolls into view.
Create custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to detect when elements enter the viewport and return a boolean state for triggering animations.
Import and render About component below Hero section.

requirements.summary: Implement Skills section with categorized skill grid and hover effects
acceptanceCriteria: Five distinct skill categories are displayed: Languages, Frontend, Backend, Databases, Tools
Skills are arranged in a grid layout
Hover effects are implemented on skill items with subtle visual feedback

file_operations.description: Create Skills component with five categorized skill groups (Languages, Frontend, Backend, Databases, Tools). Display skills in a clean grid layout with hover micro-interactions (subtle scale or color change on hover) using CSS transitions.
Import and render Skills component below About section.

requirements.summary: Implement Projects section with professional project cards and hover animations
acceptanceCriteria: Project cards display all required fields: title, description, tech stack, GitHub and Live Demo buttons
Descriptions are 1-2 lines and problem-focused
Hover effect scales card slightly and enhances shadow
Multiple sample projects are displayed to demonstrate the layout

file_operations.description: Create Projects component that displays multiple project cards with title, 1-2 line problem-focused description, tech stack, GitHub link button, and Live Demo button. Implement hover animations (slight scale up and shadow enhancement) on cards. Include 3-4 sample projects to demonstrate the layout.

Create reusable ProjectCard component that accepts props for title, description, tech stack array, GitHub URL, and demo URL. Implement hover effect with slight scale and shadow enhancement using CSS transforms and transitions.
Import and render Projects component below Skills section, with id='projects' for scroll navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement Resume section with PDF download button and hover feedback
acceptanceCriteria: Resume download button is clearly visible and labeled
Button indicates PDF download functionality
Hover effect provides visual feedback

file_operations.description: Create Resume component with a clear download button labeled 'Download Resume' that links to a PDF file. Implement professional hover feedback (color change, scale, or shadow) using CSS transitions.
Add placeholder PDF file for resume download. Users will replace this with their actual resume.
Import and render Resume component below Projects section.

requirements.summary: Implement Contact section with email, social links, form, and interaction animations
acceptanceCriteria: Email address is displayed clearly
GitHub and LinkedIn icons are present and linked
Contact form includes standard fields (name, email, message)
Form inputs show subtle animations on focus/interaction

file_operations.description: Create Contact component displaying email address, GitHub and LinkedIn icon links, and a simple contact form with name, email, and message fields. Implement subtle animations on form interaction (focus states, input animations) using CSS transitions. Form submission can log to console as no backend persistence is required.
Import and render Contact component below Resume section.

requirements.summary: Implement scroll-triggered animations for all major sections
acceptanceCriteria: Sections animate into view when scrolled to
Animation combines fade-in and slide-up effects
Animations are smooth and complete within 0.3-0.6 seconds
No animation lag or jank

file_operations.description: Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animation using useScrollAnimation hook. Apply animation classes when section enters viewport.
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animation using useScrollAnimation hook. Apply animation classes when section enters viewport.
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animation using useScrollAnimation hook. Apply animation classes when section enters viewport.
Add scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animation using useScrollAnimation hook. Apply animation classes when section enters viewport.
Add CSS animation keyframes and utility classes for fade-in and slide-up animations with 0.3-0.6 second duration and smooth easing functions.

requirements.summary: Implement hover effects and smooth scrolling throughout the site
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons respond to hover with visual feedback
Cards have lift or shadow enhancement on hover
Navigation items show animated underline or highlight on hover
Page scrolling is smooth (no instant jumps)

file_operations.description: Create Navigation component with links to major sections (About, Skills, Projects, Resume, Contact). Implement animated underline or highlight effects on hover using CSS transitions. Add smooth scroll behavior for anchor links.
Import and render Navigation component at the top of the application, above Hero section.

Add global smooth scrolling behavior with 'scroll-behavior: smooth' on html element. Add CSS transition utilities for button hover effects (scale, color) and card hover effects (lift, shadow enhancement).

requirements.summary: Apply modern minimal design system with typography, color palette, and spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses neutral base colors with one distinct accent color (not blue and purple combination)
Typography resembles Inter or Poppins font families
Whitespace and spacing are consistent across all sections
Text has excellent contrast against backgrounds
Overall design feels modern and minimal

file_operations.description: Configure custom color palette with neutral base colors (grays) and one distinct accent color (not blue/purple combination, consider emerald, amber, or rose). Add Inter or Poppins font family to fontFamily configuration. Define consistent spacing scale.

Import Inter or Poppins font from Google Fonts. Apply base typography styles with proper line-height, letter-spacing, and font-weight hierarchy. Set consistent spacing variables and ensure excellent contrast ratios for text readability.
Add Google Fonts link for Inter or Poppins font family in the document head.

requirements.summary: Establish sophisticated visual theme with cohesive design system
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design feels cohesive and professional across all sections
Color scheme is sophisticated and suitable for a developer portfolio
Typography hierarchy is clear and readable
Overall aesthetic appeals to tech recruiters and hiring managers

file_operations.description: Define comprehensive typography hierarchy (h1-h6, body, small) with clear size scale and weight variations. Apply consistent section padding/margins and create visual rhythm through spacing. Ensure professional color application throughout with cohesive theme suitable for tech recruiters.

Configure theme with professional color scheme avoiding blue/purple unless requested. Set up typography scale, spacing system, and design tokens that create visual harmony. Add shadow and border-radius scales for modern, minimal aesthetic.
